title: Foreign aid given for emergencies and longer-term development
subtitle: Committed bilateral [official development assistance (ODA)](#dod:oda) from governments and multilateral organizations, grants from civil society organizations. Aid for emergencies, such as natural disasters and wars, is often called humanitarian aid. This data is expressed in US dollars and adjusted for inflation.
